title: The Dancing Salmon: An Alaskan Folklore Tale of the Northern Lights
description: The Dancing Salmon are magical creatures that help spread the joys of the aurora across the north. When Ihana discovers the pond that the dancing salmon call home, she also meets their caretaker- Flynt. But Flynt looks so thin, and so hungry, and Ihana doesn't understand why he won't just eat the dancing salmon that live in the pond beside his cabin. With a little push from Flynt, Ihana embarks on an adventure to discover the purpose of the dancing salmon, and why Flynt could never feast upon one.
author: Lone Alaskan Gypsy
